addons.name: Maternity Expenses
addons.details: In Individual policies, we can offer Maternity Expenses to Adult Insured Male member as well. However, claim under this benefit shall be payable to the female spouse upon adding them as an Insured in the Policy. In such cases the applicable waiting period shall be as per the first inception of the policy.
